Method Detail

getStrategyInSingleParity

public static MemorylessStrategy getStrategyInSingleParity(Game game,
                                                           GamePlayer player,
                                                           StateSet states)
Returns a memoryless strategy for a player in a subgame where all states have the same parity.

Parameters:
game - a game
player - a player which wins on the single parity
states - the states of the subgame
Returns:
a memoryless strategy for a player in the subgame

getStrategyFromWinningRegion

public static MemorylessStrategy getStrategyFromWinningRegion(Game game,
                                                              GamePlayer player,
                                                              StateSet region)
Returns a strategy for a winning region of a player.

Parameters:
game - a game
player - a game player
region - a winning of the player
Returns:
a strategy for the winning region of the player

projectSolution

public static MemorylessSolution projectSolution(Game game,
                                                 Solution<MemorylessStrategy> solution)
Returns a memoryless solution for a specified game based on another memoryless solution. The winning regions will be mapped to the states of the game based on the state IDs of the winning regions. The winning strategies will be mapped to the transitions of the game based on the transition IDs of the winning strategies.

Parameters:
game - a game
solution - a memoryless solution that may not be solved for the game
Returns:
a memoryless solution for the specified game obtained from the specified solution
